    • Method Detail

      • getTaskStats

        public static ArrayList<Stats> getTaskStats(int houseId,
                                            int numberOfMonthsAgo)
        Used to get info from the database about how many trips and chores each member of the household does each month.
        Parameters:
        houseId - The id of the household that you want to find info about.
        numberOfMonthsAgo - How far back the info goes.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Stats objects.

      • getExpenseStats

        public static double[] getExpenseStats(int houseId,
                                       int numberOfMonthsAgo)
        Used to get info about how much money is used per month in the household.
        Parameters:
        houseId - The id of the household you want to find info about.
        numberOfMonthsAgo - How many months back to look for data.
        Returns:
        Returns a double[] where the index decides which month + 1, and the value at each index is how much was used that month.
